page.title: 12Communications
page.content: The main means of communication people in Aby area use are postal services, telephone, national & local newspapers, church magazines & posters.{Mail}delivered week-day mornings - collected afternoons. There are 2 sub Post Offices in the area, ie Aby & Authorpe & 4 separate posting boxes. Authorpe is in the Louth postal area & the rest in the Alford area. More than half of the private households have a{telephone}and there are two public kiosks.{Local}and {national papers}are delivered daily, a local newspaper is delivered weekly. A Withern Group of Parishes monthly {Church magazine}is taken by about one third of the households. This magazine is delivered by hand on a voluntary basis.
